body_html:
@soumith There is likely a better change if the value is dynamic. My modification was based on line 107 in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/.jenkins/pytorch/win-build.sh.

On my machine, I needed to manually set this in my environment to get a clean build on Windows; another engineer on our side had to do the same thing.

Perhaps the issue is in the detection logic?
